Class ChoiceMenuBuilder<T>

java.lang.Object
com.dua3.utility.fx.controls.abstract_builders.MenuItemBuilder<javafx.scene.control.Menu, ChoiceMenuBuilder<T>>
com.dua3.utility.fx.controls.ChoiceMenuBuilder<T>
Type Parameters:
T - the type of the items
public class ChoiceMenuBuilder<T> extends MenuItemBuilder<javafx.scene.control.Menu, ChoiceMenuBuilder<T>>
A builder for menus with a choice of items.

    Description

    bind(javafx.beans.property.Property<@Nullable T> property)
    Binds the menu's internal property to the specified external property, enabling bidirectional synchronization of items between the two properties.

      public ChoiceMenuBuilder<T> initialValue(T initialValue)
      Sets the initial value for the choice menu.
      Parameters:
      initialValue - the initial value to set
      Returns:

    • onChange

      public ChoiceMenuBuilder<T> onChange(Consumer<@Nullable T> onChange)
      Sets a callback to be invoked whenever the selected value in the choice menu changes.
      Parameters:
      onChange - a Consumer that accepts the new value of type T, or null if no value is selected or the value is explicitly set to null
      Returns:
      this instance of the ChoiceMenuBuilder for method chaining

    • bind

      public ChoiceMenuBuilder<T> bind(javafx.beans.property.Property<@Nullable T> property)
      Binds the menu's internal property to the specified external property, enabling bidirectional synchronization of items between the two properties.
      Parameters:
      property - the external Property to bind bidirectionally with the builder's internal property; can hold null items
      Returns:
      this instance of the ChoiceMenuBuilder for method chaining

    • build

      public javafx.scene.control.Menu build()
      Description copied from class: MenuItemBuilder
      Builds and returns a new instance of the MenuItem type specified by the builder.

      Derived classes should always call super.build() to get an instance and then apply the added configuration.

      Overrides:
      build in class MenuItemBuilder<javafx.scene.control.Menu, ChoiceMenuBuilder<T>>
      Returns:
      a new instance of the MenuItem created by the factory associated with this builder
